医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
调查显示，美国人认为心理健康治疗不如身体健康治疗据一项调查显示，四分之三的美国人认为，在美国医疗保健系统中，心理健康问题的识别和治疗比身体健康问题的处理要糟糕得多，尽管超过 80% 的人认为过去五年心理健康问题的患病率急剧上升。 West Health 和盖洛普在心理健康意识月和美国老年人月开始时发布的新调查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Americans-perceive-mental-health-treatment-as-inferior-to-physical-health-care-survey-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Americans-perceive-mental-health-treatment-as-inferior-to-physical-health-care-survey-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3472f987-d312-4955-bfa3-14694b8ced14 Thu, 02 May 2024 09:57:20 -0400 Americans perceive mental health treatment as inferior to physical health care, survey reveals
ChatGPT 在心脏病风险评估方面存在不足尽管 ChatGPT 据称能够通过体检，但新的研究表明，依赖它进行某些健康评估（例如胸痛患者是否需要住院）是不明智的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/ChatGPT-falls-short-in-heart-risk-assessment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/ChatGPT-falls-short-in-heart-risk-assessment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9aa72b3-a8d4-45f4-a345-f24cd0682f17 Thu, 02 May 2024 09:39:12 -0400 ChatGPT falls short in heart risk assessment
研究发现阿司匹林在预防乳腺癌复发方面没有任何益处阿司匹林是否可以降低乳腺癌幸存者发生浸润性癌症事件的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Aspirin-shows-no-benefit-in-preventing-breast-cancer-recurrence-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Aspirin-shows-no-benefit-in-preventing-breast-cancer-recurrence-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a794570e-67cf-465b-993d​​-08f6e541c302 Thu, 02 May 2024 09:12:00 -0400 Aspirin shows no benefit in preventing breast cancer recurrence, study finds
新研究表明，情绪敏感性增加与之前感染过 COVID-19 相关先前的 2019 冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 感染如何通过行为免疫标记影响社会情绪功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Increased-emotional-sensitivity-linked-to-previous-COVID-19-infection-new-research-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Increased-emotional-sensitivity-linked-to-previous-COVID-19-infection-new-research-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a26d9b4e-8936-48a9-b13a-26e8185e2bbc Thu, 02 May 2024 08:20:00 -0400 Increased emotional sensitivity linked to previous COVID-19 infection, new research suggests
“违背承诺”：加州赤字可能会阻碍残疾工人的加薪智力和发育障碍人士的家庭表示，州长加文·纽瑟姆(Gavin Newsom)违背了为照顾亲人的工人提高工资的计划，倡导者警告说，如果残疾人服务变得更难获得，可能会提起诉讼。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/e28098Breaking-a-promisee28099-California-deficit-could-halt-raises-for-disability-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/e28098Breaking-a-promisee28099-California-deficit-could-halt-raises-for-disability-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d369705-78e3-4569-9658-e2b1f6ccbbfa Thu, 02 May 2024 08:06:10 -0400 ‘Breaking a promise’: California deficit could halt raises for disability workers
调查凸显了人们对防晒和预防皮肤癌的误解奥兰多健康癌症研究所进行的一项新的全国调查发现，近三分之一 (32%) 的美国人认为晒黑能让人看起来更好、更健康，专家表示，这种危险的美容标准可能会导致暴露在阳光下的危险行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Survey-highlights-misconceptions-on-sun-protection-and-skin-cancer-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Survey-highlights-misconceptions-on-sun-protection-and-skin-cancer-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e088862-c34b-431c-94db-179c4499f6f8 Thu, 02 May 2024 07:57:38 -0400 Survey highlights misconceptions on sun protection and skin cancer prevention
过早的手术绝经可能导致肌肉疾病的风险增加肌肉骨骼疼痛是一种普遍的更年期症状，这有助于解释为什么女性通常比男性经历更多的疼痛，尤其是在 50 岁左右。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Premature-surgical-menopause-can-lead-to-increased-risk-of-muscle-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Premature-surgical-menopause-can-lead-to-increased-risk-of-muscle-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6e2573f-2915-498f-9904-49c5c3520a70 Thu, 02 May 2024 07:51:55 -0400 Premature surgical menopause can lead to increased risk of muscle disorders
研究人员揭示了类风湿关节炎患者独特的自身抗体特征类风湿性关节炎 (RA) 患者都有一组独特且多样化的抗体，这些抗体参与了疾病的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Researchers-unveil-unique-autoantibody-profiles-in-rheumatoid-arthritis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Researchers-unveil-unique-autoantibody-profiles-in-rheumatoid-arthritis-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a2ca115-3fda-4453-990c-5454c70ccb73 Thu, 02 May 2024 07:42:27 -0400 Researchers unveil unique autoantibody profiles in rheumatoid arthritis patients
Nuclera eProtein Discovery 系统安装在领先的学术机构新颖的平台可自动化并加速蛋白质生产，能够在 48 小时内扩大到毫克量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Nuclera-eProtein-Discovery-system-installed-at-leading-academic-institutes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Nuclera-eProtein-Discovery-system-installed-at-leading-academic-institutes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64f8d0af-3295-4206-a097-b9c7d4b7d76e Thu, 02 May 2024 07:31:00 -0400 Nuclera eProtein Discovery system installed at leading academic institutes
欧洲国家结直肠癌筛查的差异使用粪便检测和结肠镜检查进行结直肠癌（CRC）筛查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Disparities-in-colorectal-cancer-screening-revealed-among-European-nations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240502/Disparities-in-colorectal-cancer-screening-revealed-among-European-nations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6044dfe-e54d-492e-b283-35b07b8bef2d Thu, 02 May 2024 06:47:00 -0400 Disparities in colorectal cancer screening revealed among European nations
